com.easytools.views.animation

类 JumpingBeans

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easytools.views.animation.JumpingBeans

  • public final class JumpingBeans
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides "jumping beans" functionality for a TextView.

    Remember to call the stopJumping() method once you're done using the JumpingBeans (that is, when you detach the TextView from the view tree, you hide it, or the parent Activity/Fragment goes in the paused status). This will allow to release the animations and free up memory and CPU that would be otherwise wasted.

    Please note that you:

    • Must not try to change a jumping beans text in a textview before calling stopJumping() as to avoid unnecessary invalidation calls; the JumpingBeans class cannot know when this happens and will keep animating the textview (well, try to, anyway), wasting resources
    • Must not try to use a jumping beans text in another view; it will not animate. Just create another jumping beans animation for each new view
    • Must not use more than one JumpingBeans instance on a single TextView, as the first cleanup operation called on any of these JumpingBeans will also cleanup all other JumpingBeans' stuff. This is most likely not what you want to happen in some cases.
    • Should not use JumpingBeans on large chunks of text. Ideally this should be done on small views with just a few words. We've strived to make it as inexpensive as possible to use JumpingBeans but invalidating and possibly relayouting a large TextView can be pretty expensive.

    • 字段详细资料

      • DEFAULT_ANIMATION_DUTY_CYCLE

        public static final float DEFAULT_ANIMATION_DUTY_CYCLE
        The default fraction of the whole animation time spent actually animating. The rest of the range will be spent in "resting" state. This the "duty cycle" of the jumping animation.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_LOOP_DURATION

        public static final int DEFAULT_LOOP_DURATION
        The default duration of a whole jumping animation loop, in milliseconds.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        public void stopJumping()
        Stops the jumping animation and frees up the animations.
